| description       = This ancient Huana weapon once belonged to the legendary barbarian Maoalahua the Battle Crazed. Known both for his love of violence and love of money, Maoalahua sold his services as a warrior to the highest bidder. He had no compunction against fighting on either side of a conflict and did so frequently, sometimes switching sides during a single battle. If he was rumored to be fighting, opposing commanders would actively bid for his loyalty throughout the course of the melee.

Maoalahua was indiscriminate in battle - striking all who came near, both friend and foe. He could be relied on to never give ground, however, and his "allies" always gave him a wide berth in which to do his deadly work.
